sources.title: Three Stops to Murder
sources.description: Title: Three Stops to Murder Summary: Discharged by his employer, a private eye stays on a jewel theft case after a model with information for him is murdered. Directed by: Terence Fisher Actors: Tom Conway, Mila Parély, Naomi Chance Production Company: Hammer Films Release Date: 1953 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Discharged by his employer, a private eye stays on a jewel theft case after a model with information for him is murdered.

metadata.Plot: Discharged by his employer, a private eye stays on a jewel theft case after a model with information for him is murdered.
